description:
About the position

The position aims to ensure effective implementation, monitoring and measurement of compliance with quality assurance programs in Symrise Ltda processes. This includes risk management and assessment, managing software linked to quality systems, change control, identification of root causes, and implementation and process monitoring. The role also involves conducting corporate social responsibility audits, including FSC22000 and HACCP, among others.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Ensure effective implementation of quality assurance programs
,
‚Ä¢ Monitor and measure compliance with quality assurance programs
,
‚Ä¢ Conduct risk management and assessment
,
‚Ä¢ Manage software linked to quality systems
,
‚Ä¢ Oversee change control processes
,
‚Ä¢ Identify root causes of issues
,
‚Ä¢ Implement and monitor processes
,
‚Ä¢ Conduct corporate social responsibility audits (FSC22000, HACCP, etc.)

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Fluent in English
,
‚Ä¢ Experience in process audits
,
‚Ä¢ Auditor certification (desirable)

Nice-to-haves
‚Ä¢ Soft skills in effective/assertive communication
,
‚Ä¢ Ability to work in a team
,
‚Ä¢ Results-oriented mindset

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Opportunity to develop and create compelling experiences
,
‚Ä¢ Open and transparent company culture
,
‚Ä¢ Focus on employee health and well-being
,
‚Ä¢ Strong business growth leading to career development opportunities

description: Job Description Administrar la cadena de suministro mediante el control de ordenes de compra y los planes de reabastecimiento para tener una mejor supervisi√≥n de la demanda anticipada y satisfacer la demanda futura. El analista comercial tendr√° relaci√≥n con distribuidores y clientes del canal food service. Estar a cargo de la gesti√≥n de inventarios y seguimiento de sell-out para identificar tendencias de ventas y as√≠ crear la previsi√≥n mensual. Comunicaci√≥n con el cliente para optimizar el proceso de entrega y cumplir con los objetivos de stock- inventario y ventas mientras se mantienen las tasas de llenado. Reunirse con el Equipo de Planificaci√≥n & Customer Service para verificar los √≠tems con riesgo- fechas de soluci√≥n y mantener la comunicaci√≥n con el cliente para llevar a cabo planes de acci√≥n en conjunto sin impactar otros indicadores. Monitorear el inventario de cada cliente y cada SKU. Comunicarse con el centro de distribuici√≥n para monitorear los pedidos y despacharlos Alinear el equipo del canal para recibir e ingresar ordenes de compras. Requisitos Titulado/a en ingenier√≠a comercial- ingenier√≠a industrial- administraci√≥n de empresas o afines. Al menos 1 a√±o de experiencia en an√°lisis, ventas, finanzas, previsi√≥n, cadena de suministro y/o planificaci√≥n de ventas. Experiencia en trabajo en equipo y bajo presi√≥n. Capacidad para comunicarse- trabajar de forma independiente y organizada. Conocimiento de los programas de Microsoft Office (Excel avanzado) Ingl√©s intermedio tenga en cuenta que parte de su primera entrevista se llevar√° a cabo en ingl√©s Modalidad H√≠brida 2 d√≠as de teletrabajo Oficina en Las Condes, a pasos del metro Alc√°ntara Location(s) Santiago, Chile Kraft Heinz is an Equal Opportunity Employer ‚Äì Underrepresented Ethnic Minority Groups/Women/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity and other protected classes. ABOUT US Kraft Heinz is a global food company with a delicious heritage. With iconic and emerging food and beverage brands around the world, we deliver the best taste, fun and quality to every meal table we touch. We‚Äôre on a mission to disrupt not only our own business, but the global food industry. A consumer obsession and unexpected partnerships fuel our progress as we drive innovation across every part of our company. Around the world, our people are connected by a culture of ownership, agility and endless curiosity. We also believe in being good humans, who are working to improve our company, communities, and planet. We‚Äôre proud of where we‚Äôve been ‚Äì and even more thrilled about where we‚Äôre headed ‚Äì as we nourish the world and lead the future of food. WHY US We grow our people to grow our business. We champion great people who bring ambition, curiosity, and high performance to the table as the guardians of our beloved and nostalgic brands. Good isn't good enough. We choose greatness every day by challenging the ordinary and making bold decisions. All while celebrating our wins - and our failures ‚Äì as we work together to lead the future of food. Challenging the status quo takes talent. We invest in your purpose and potential by developing skills and nurturing strengths that leave a legacy on our business and a lasting impact on your career. Because great people make great companies, and we‚Äôre growing something great here at Kraft Heinz. INCLUSION MATTERS TO US Everyone is welcome at our table. In fact, we thrive on learning and growing from our diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Doesn‚Äôt matter who you are, where you‚Äôre from, or who makes your heart sing. We want you to show up as your authentic self, excited to work with amazing colleagues to solve complex challenges and innovate in an ever-changing industry. We‚Äôre committed to: Hiring and growing talent from diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Growing our Business Resource Groups ‚Äî vibrant, celebrated communities that enhance our business through thought leadership employee engagement and professional development opportunities. Providing our managers and leaders high quality learning experiences to explore how to foster inclusion and belonging.

description:
En Kelly¬Æ, nos apasiona ayudarlo a encontrar un trabajo que funcione para usted. ¬øQue tal este? Estamos buscando un consultor de talentos para trabajar en una reconocida compa√±√≠a de seguros en Chicago, IL. Con nosotros, se trata de encontrar el trabajo perfecto.

Instant√°nea

.0;

‚Ä¢ Debe vivir en el √°rea de Chicago para poder venir al sitio para proyectos especiales

Este puesto es responsable de respaldar la investigaci√≥n, el dise√±o y la implementaci√≥n de iniciativas de gesti√≥n del talento que respalden el crecimiento y el desarrollo de l√≠deres. The scope includes creating data analysis, visualization, storytelling and preparing recommendations to support performance management strategies; participating with teams that consult with business partners, customers, and internal workgroups; the creation and coordination of data analysis, dashboards and project management activities.

Job Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Support the design, develop, and implement talent management strategies and detailed processes to enhance the experience of internal stakeholders.
‚Ä¢ Support the development and implementation of talent management programs (goal setting, performance reviews, succession planning, talent reviews etc.)
‚Ä¢ Manage talent review cycles and contribute to the creation of support materials
‚Ä¢ Develop project plans, timelines and work breakdown structures.
‚Ä¢ Monitor project progress and track deliverables, milestones, risks and issues.
‚Ä¢ Coordinate project meetings, prepare status reports, and support stakeholder communications.
‚Ä¢ Collect and analyze project data to identify trends, risks and opportunities for improvement.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to post-project reviews and lessons-learned sessions.
‚Ä¢ Assist in creating templates and processes.
‚Ä¢ Conduct needs assessments to identify process gaps and to identify appropriate solutions.
‚Ä¢ Design, development, and execution of recurring and ad-hoc dashboards and reports that highlights trends, risks and opportunities across talent management.
‚Ä¢ Conduct workforce data analyses to uncover trends and support decision making
‚Ä¢ Present data-driven insights and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and actionable format.
‚Ä¢ Create compelling data visualizations (in Power BI or a similar tool) to effectively communicate insights to non technical audiences
‚Ä¢ Translate complex data findings into actionable insights and recommendations through presentations and executive summaries.
‚Ä¢ Conduct analyses that inform strategic TM decisions such as succession planning.
‚Ä¢ Work on various projects to support Talent Management activities.
‚Ä¢ Build strong relationships with internal and external customers to maintain project/task momentum.
‚Ä¢ Track progress on project work to execute plans, maintain regular communication with managers, leads and team members; share information with multi-disciplinary teams including, business partners, internal team, and delivery teams.
‚Ä¢ Respond to requests by being proactive and setting expectations with customers and SMEs.
‚Ä¢ Continuously see opportunities to innovate and improve talent management processes and programs.

Required Job Qualification:
‚Ä¢ Talent development or people analytics background; understanding of performance management and talent management.

‚Ä¢ Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills.

‚Ä¢ Pays close attention to timebound projects and meets those hard deadlines.

‚Ä¢ Detail oriented with strong organizational and time management skills.

‚Ä¢ Analytical thinker with the ability to synthesize complex data and identify trends.
‚Ä¢ Strong Microsoft Office tools, especially PowerPoint and Excel data analysis such as SQL.
‚Ä¢ Strong project management skills, use of Project to track progress and timelines and able to drive cross functional initiatives.
‚Ä¢ Self-starter, motivated.

description:
Cuidado de la salud de Crothall

Crothall Healthcare es una empresa de Compass One que brinda servicios de apoyo especializados, innovadores y receptivos de alta calidad exclusivamente para la industria de la salud. Crothall presta servicios a muchos de los 100 mejores hospitales a trav√©s de sus m√°s de 1300 equipos de servicios de salud en 46 estados. Crothall ha sido reconocida como uno de los mejores lugares para trabajar y los mejores lugares para trabajar en Pensilvania por la revista Modern Healthcare desde 2013 y como uno de los 150 mejores lugares para trabajar seg√∫n Becker desde 2016. Somos una divisi√≥n de Compass Group USA y nuestro equipo cuenta con m√°s de 26 000 miembros. Nuestros servicios principales incluyen: servicios medioambientales, soluciones de tecnolog√≠a sanitaria, transporte de pacientes, lavander√≠a y ropa de cama, gesti√≥n de instalaciones y veh√≠culos el√©ctricos ambulatorios. Esta doble funci√≥n proporcionar√° actualizaciones cr√≠ticas del sistema, funciones de generaci√≥n de informes y soporte de back-end para m√∫ltiples √°reas de las cuentas por cobrar, que incluyen, entre otras, la contabilidad de ingresos, la facturaci√≥n, la administraci√≥n de centros de costos y el cumplimiento tributario. Se trata de un puesto remoto con viajes ocasionales a la oficina corporativa en Pensilvania.

Resumen:

Responsabilidades:

18 Comunica a su L√≠der de Equipo y/o al Equipo de Inocuidad de los Alimentos los problemas que se identifiquen en relaci√≥n con el cumplimiento a la Calidad y la Inocuidad del producto.

20 Promueve y supervisa con sus equipos de trabajo el cumplimiento a las buenas pr√°cticas de manufactura de acuerdo con el Programas prerrequisito en seguridad alimentaria. ISO/TS 22002-1:2009 Manufactura de los alimentos.

21 Participar en el cumplimiento a los planes de acci√≥n para el tratamiento de riesgos, logro de los objetivos y la mejora que se defina para sus procesos.

22 Comunicar al l√≠der de equipo y/o gerente de √°rea los riesgos y las oportunidades que se identifiquen durante la gesti√≥n de las actividades del proceso, con el fin de que se alcance los resultados previstos (objetivos), y el cumplimiento a las necesidades y expectativas del cliente, y de las partes interesadas.

23 Liderear el control de los procesos administrativos de un proyecto de inversi√≥n, que van desde la gesti√≥n del recurso hasta el cierre del proyecto.

24 Administrar los recursos financieros autorizados en cada proyecto de inversi√≥n, para asegurar la correcta planificaci√≥n, asignaci√≥n y ejecuci√≥n del recurso.

‚Ä¢ Utilizacion de sistemas y herramientas informaticas para la planificacion y seguimiento de la produccion, mediante programacion de Excel.
